public class PBXChannelWS2812
extends PBXDataChannel

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void setDrawMode​(DrawMode dm)
    Sets pixel drawing mode, either DrawMode.FAST (brightness & gamma adjustment only) or DrawMode.ENHANCED (brightness, gamma, color correction, color depth expansion if supported by LEDs).

    Methods inherited from class pbxuniverse.PBXDataChannel

    getBrightness, getPixelCount, setBrightness, setColorCorrection, setGammaCorrection

  • Method Details

    • setDrawMode

      public void setDrawMode​(DrawMode dm)
      Sets pixel drawing mode, either DrawMode.FAST (brightness & gamma adjustment only) or DrawMode.ENHANCED (brightness, gamma, color correction, color depth expansion if supported by LEDs). DrawMode can be changed at any time.
      Overrides:
      setDrawMode in class PBXDataChannel
